painting01.title: The Starry Night
painting01.description: Depicts a night sky filled with swirling stars above a quiet village. The contrast between the bright stars and the dark sky creates a sense of both tranquility and dynamic movement, reflecting van Gogh's emotional intensity and unique style

painting02.title: Sunflowers
painting02.description: A series of paintings showcasing sunflowers in various stages of life, painted in vibrant yellows. These works symbolize van Gogh's admiration for nature and his ability to convey emotion through color

painting03.title: Cafe Terrace at Night
painting03.description: Illustrates a cozy café under a starlit sky in Arles, France. The warm glow from the café contrasts with the deep blue of the night sky, creating a welcoming and romantic atmosphere

painting04.title: Bedroom in Arles
painting04.description: Depicting van Gogh's bedroom in Arles, this painting uses bold colors and simple lines to convey a sense of calm and intimacy. The vibrant hues of the furniture and walls reflect van Gogh's unique approach to color

painting05.title: Wheatfield with Crows
painting05.description: Portrays a foreboding wheat field under a stormy sky, with crows flying above. The stark contrast between the golden wheat and dark sky evokes a sense of unease and tension, often seen as a reflection of van Gogh's troubled state of mind

statue01.title: Venus Callipyge
statue01.description: The sculpture depicts a partially draped woman revealing her hips and buttocks, looking back over her shoulder, possibly Venus (Aphrodite) or a mortal woman.

statue02.title: Trajan Cuirass
statue02.description: The statue of Emperor Trajan in ceremonial armor depicts him standing confidently, as if addressing his troops. It highlights his military leadership and esteemed status in Roman history.
